pages.text: The $(item)Soul Alloy Hatchet$() is a powerful tool, both in damage and its $(thing)Soul Feller Ability$(). When right-clicking a destructive beam will obliterate any logs on contact. $(br)Using a Gem Tinkerer lets you put $(l:conjuring:basics/basic_gem_tinkering#aspect_gems)Aspect Gems$() on your $(item)Soul Alloy Hatchet$():$(br) $(li)$(#007a18)≈ Haste: Improves the efficiency of felling trees with the hatchet.$(br)

$(li)$(#a80f01)ღ Abundance: Rewards you with larger spoils when killing an enemy.$()$(br) $(li)$(#4d8184)λ Scope: Increases the reach of the Soul Felling ability.$()$(br) $(li)$(#123f89)ʊ Ignorance: Ignores a small amount of durability when using the tool. Stacks with unbreaking.
